narrative.title: 34Th Infantry Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: American Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Standard US Infantry Division - triangular organization with three infantry regiments. Assault infantry for II Corps operations in Tunisia Campaign.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: mountainous terrain, rocky hills, intermittent wadis

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Mountain warfare capability developed through Tunisia operations
Combined arms coordination with divisional artillery

environment.terrain_type: mountainous terrain, rocky hills, intermittent wadis
